title: Understanding the ON Clause
text: The ON cluase tells us how we should join the tables, typically by specifying a common column name to join on.

hintAnswer: It specifies the condition for joining tables, usually by matching columns.
title: Using the ON Clause
text: What is the purpose of the ON clause in a SQL JOIN statement?
choices: It specifies the condition for joining tables, usually by matching columns.
It limits the number of rows returned.
It defines the order of the output columns.
